    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        public Hero(int x,
            int y)
        Constructor of the class. The Hero is initially unarmed.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the new hero.
        y - The y coordinate of the new hero.

    • Method Detail

      • isArmed

        public boolean isArmed()
        Returns true if the the hero is armed.
        Returns:
        The value of variable armed.

      • setArmed

        public void setArmed(boolean armed)
        Modifies the value of the variable armed.
        Parameters:
        armed - New value for the armed variable.

      • heroMove

        public void heroMove(java.lang.String move,
                     GameState gs)
        Sets the value of the (possible) next X and Y coordinates according to the move argument.
        Parameters:
        move - The string correspondent to the side which the hero should move to.
        gs - The current gamestate.

      • action

        public void action(GameState gs)
        Defines what the hero will do according to level and coordinates.
        Parameters:
        gs - The current gamestate.

      • actionLevel1

        public void actionLevel1(GameState gs)
        Defines what the hero will do if playing on the first level. The hero will only move if the ny and nx coordinates point to an empty space, lever or open door. If the hero moves, the guard will also move.
        Parameters:
        gs - The current gamestate.

      • actionLevel2

        public void actionLevel2(GameState gs)
        Defines what the hero will do if playing on the second level. The hero will only move if the ny and nx coordinates point to an empty space, an open door (or closed if he has the key) or the key. When the hero moves the ogres also move (or try to at least).
        Parameters:
        gs - The current gamestate.
